content: SAF CLI consolidates SAF automation goals into a convenient command-line tool, including commands to: generate InSpec security validation code, set and validate threshold checks within a pipeline, convert security tool test data to and from our standard Heimdall Data Format (HDF), and automate Heimdall setup and deployment.
Heimdall can now auto-convert native security data file formats just through drag and drop! These are the same formats supported by the saf convert tool (formerly Heimdall-tools).
The SAF team has published eMASSer, a CLI tool providing utilities for interacting with the eMASS API!
Check back often to find the latest information on InSpec profiles, Heimdall-tool converters, and Heimdall updates!
Heimdall-lite.cms.gov is live! CMS now has its own version of Heimdall-lite, an in-browser tool for analyzing security data!
SAF CLI will replace all the capabilities of the current InSpec Tools.
SAF CLI will help update existing InSpec profiles to current STIG and CIS standards.
